# Lua

```lua
print("Hello, World!")
for i = 1, 5 do
    print(i)
end
```

# Shell

```sh
echo "Hello, World!"
for i in {1..5}
do
    echo $i
done
```

# Python

```python
print("Hello, World!")
for i in range(1, 6):
    print(i)
```

# Javascript

```js
console.log("Hello, World!");
for (let i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {
    console.log(i);
}
```

# Rust

```rs
fn main() {
    println!("Hello, World!");
    for i in 1..=5 {
        println!("{}", i);
    }
}
main();
```

# C++

```cpp
#include <iostream>
int main() {
    std::cout << "Hello, World!" << std::endl;
    for (int i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {
        std::cout << i << std::endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
main();
```
